camel.kamelet.elasticsearch-search-sourc.name: camel.kamelet.elasticsearch-search-source.period
camel.kamelet.elasticsearch-search-sourc.description: The time interval between two searches

camel.kamelet.elasticsearch-search-sourc.name: camel.kamelet.elasticsearch-search-source.query
camel.kamelet.elasticsearch-search-sourc.description: The query we want to use to search on ElasticSearch.

camel.kamelet.elasticsearch-search-sourc.name: camel.kamelet.elasticsearch-search-source.enableSSL
camel.kamelet.elasticsearch-search-sourc.description: Do we want to connect using SSL?

camel.kamelet.elasticsearch-search-sourc.name: camel.kamelet.elasticsearch-search-source.hostAddresses
camel.kamelet.elasticsearch-search-sourc.description: Comma separated list with ip:port formatted remote transport addresses to use.

camel.kamelet.elasticsearch-search-sourc.name: camel.kamelet.elasticsearch-search-source.indexName
camel.kamelet.elasticsearch-search-sourc.description: The name of the index to act against.
